title: An hour of Corrosion
author: VD
content_html: Actually an hour and 18 minutes, to be precise. And it happens to include my favorite chapter. If you ever enjoyed Isaac Asimov’s Foundation, I can just about guarantee that you will very much like Corrosion. It’s no longer on Audible, so you can only acquire it at the Arkhaven store.
